content: cupido cowl ver 2 by hiroko fukatsu finished measurements 48 / 120 cm in length by 8 / 20 cm width for long version 24 / 60 cm in length by 8 / 20 cm width for short version yarn ・rowan kid classic 2-2 5 1-1 5 skeins shown in 855 smudge 10 ply 70% wool 26% mohair 4% nylon 50g / 153 yards per skein ・puppy multico 4 2 skeins shown in col 563 10 ply mohair wool 40g / 88 yards per skein needles 5 0 mm 36 / 90 cm 24 / 45 cm circular needle change needle size if necessary to obtain gauge notions stitch marker for beginning of round tapestry needle for weaving in end gauge 17sts = 4 / 10cm in pattern stitch pattern stitch cupido round 1 *knit 3 slip 1 as if purl with yarn in back* repeat across round round 2 *purl 3 slip 1 as if purl with yarn in back* repeat across round round 3-4 repeat round 1 and 2 round 5 *knit 1 slip 1 as if purl with yarn in back knit 2* repeat across round round 6 *purl 1 slip 1 as if purl with yarn in back purl 2* repeat across round round 7-8 repeat round 5 and 6 directions with cable cast on make 200 100 stitches being careful not to twist stitches place marker and join for working in the round knit 1 round then purl 1 round repeat the 8 rounds of pattern stitch cupido above until work measures approximately 8 ending with 4th or 8th of pattern stitch make sure that you have enough yarn left for the following knit 1 round purl 1 round and bind- of loosely finishing weave in ends steam press gently over a damp cloth cupido cowl ©hiroko fukatsu 2011 all rights reserved
